extracted_text:
(E.) Minimum Lot Dimensions. The minimum lot size shall be of sufficient size to
facilitate a hazardous industry facility which meets all requirements of this
section, the Stallings Technical Standards & Specifications Manual, and all
buffer requirements for new development.
llm_output.rationale: The section titled 'Minimum Lot Dimensions' under the Heavy Industry Overlay (HIO) District specifies that the minimum lot size must be sufficient to facilitate a hazardous industry facility and meet all requirements, including buffer requirements for new development. However, it does not provide a specific numerical value.
llm_output.answer: sufficient size to facilitate a hazardous industry facility
